name: Constantine Samaan
title: Professor (Part-Time), Pediatrics
overview: Dr. Samaan is a pediatric endocrinologist at McMaster Children's Hospital and full Professor at the Department of Pediatrics, McMaster University. He did his pediatric endocrine training in Ireland and at Sick Kids Toronto.
